statements: SELECT * FROM user_credentials;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_credentials WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM user_credentials WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_credentials ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, password FROM user_credentials WHERE password = 'securepassword';
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM user_credentials WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_credentials WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT user_id, password, username FROM user_credentials WHERE user_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT username FROM user_credentials WHERE password LIKE 'pass%' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_credentials WHERE user_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'joh%';
SELECT * FROM users INNER JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'Alice' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM users;
SELECT role_name FROM roles;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT u.*, r.* FROM users u FULL JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id FULL JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, r.role_id, r.role_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id ORDER BY u.user_id DESC;
SELECT id, username FROM users;
SELECT role, user_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE expiry_time > NOW();
SELECT id, username, created_at FROM users WHERE id = 3;
SELECT username, attempted_at FROM failed_login_attempts WHERE attempted_at < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT id, username, created_at FROM users WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT u.username, ur.role FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id
SELECT u.username, us.session_token, us.expiry_time FROM users u JOIN user_sessions us ON u.id = us.user_id WHERE u.id = 10
SELECT COUNT(id), username FROM failed_login_attempts GROUP BY username HAVING COUNT(id) > 3
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id IN (1, 2) ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT u.username, s.login_time, s.logout_time FROM users u LEFT JOIN sessions s ON u.user_id = s.user_id WHERE s.session_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.user_id = r.role_id JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id;
